eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 02:04 AM ON SEP 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:46 AM SEP 20, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for (City, County or Tribal Entity). (LEO Agency) is looking for (sex M; F; name of victim)) last seen (on foot wearing or driving). If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
